Text: So when you say apply the MAS crack im assuming you mean the Mac App Store Crack.  I have seen many games come from the MAS precracked however i have not seen a general fix all MAS crack or one for this game specifically.   If there is a MAS crack all the please point me in teh right direction id love to have that or even just the one for this game.  However regardless of your answer I would like to thank you for the post keep the torrents flowing much appreciated :)

Not sure if it's due to not applying the "MAS crack" as you've stated or where to find it to apply but I'm getting the the message "You can't open the application FinalFury.app because it may be damaged or incomplete".   Any help would be great.

Well this is not gonna help you much seeing as we are experiencing a totally different issue altogether but when games are posted in their orginal format like this ie. (not zipped) the permissions tend to get a little screwy and the program Batchmod will fix it and make it work everytime (http://www.macupdate.com/app/mac/6440/batchmod)  just click all boxes with a single letter and "apply to all enclosed files and folders" and youll be back in business. This little tip has brought many torrents that dont work back to life for me sadly this is not the case for this game
